docs.lead_paragraph: On the outside, the metal box looks like an oversized bread container. But what's inside could save an abandoned newborn's life.

headline.main: Indiana May Allow 'Baby Boxes' for Surrendering Newborns
headline.print_headline: Indiana May Allow 'Baby Boxes' for Surrendering Newborns

docs.lead_paragraph: The government’s $1.3 billion program to stop H.I.V. infection in Africa is not cost effective, a new study by a Stanford student shows.

headline.main: U.S. Push for Abstinence in Africa Is Seen as Failure Against H.I.V.
headline.print_headline: American H.I.V. Battle in Africa Is Said to Falter

docs.abstract: Study conducted by Stanford Medical School student Nathan Lo finds that $1.3 billion America has spent since 2005 to stop HIV infection in Africa through abstinence and fidelity was largely wasted.
docs.snippet: The government’s $1.3 billion program to stop H.I.V. infection in Africa is not cost effective, a new study by a Stanford student shows.

docs.lead_paragraph: Former U.S. Rep. Todd Akin is putting an end to the rumors: He will not make another run for the U.S. Senate in 2016.

headline.main: Former US Rep. Todd Akin: I'm Not Running in 2016

docs.lead_paragraph: A relationship therapy TV show that premieres Friday gives most participating couples the same prescription: Go into a modular, windowless room onstage and have sex while the studio audience waits until they're done. Not surprisingly, "Sex Box" has attracted some negative attention.

headline.main: New Cable Show Offers Sex in a Box as Therapy
headline.print_headline: New Cable Show Offers Sex in a Box as Therapy

docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's highest court on Thursday struck down as unconstitutional a decades-old law banning adultery, triggering a surge in shares of condom makers and morning-after pills.

headline.main: Shares of South Korean Contraceptive Makers Surge After Court Scraps Adultery Ban
headline.print_headline: Shares of South Korean Contraceptive Makers Surge After Court Scraps Adultery Ban

docs.snippet: South Korea's highest court on Thursday struck down as unconstitutional a decades-old law banning adultery, triggering a surge in shares of condom makers and morning-after pills.

docs.lead_paragraph: A National Organization for Women executive urged an Idaho state lawmaker on Wednesday to consult with his female relatives about anatomy after he appeared to suggest during a legislative hearing that pills swallowed by women traveled to the uterus.

headline.main: Women's Rights Activist Urges Female Anatomy Lesson for Idaho Lawmaker
headline.print_headline: Women's Rights Activist Urges Female Anatomy Lesson for Idaho Lawmaker

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who pleaded guilty to charges that she and an accomplice set her Las Vegas pet store on fire with 25 puppies inside in an insurance scam was sentenced on Wednesday to at least five years in prison, a court official said.

headline.main: Las Vegas Pet Shop Owner Gets at Least 5 Years for Fire That Imperiled Puppies
headline.print_headline: Las Vegas Pet Shop Owner Gets at Least 5 Years for Fire That Imperiled Puppies

docs.snippet: A woman who pleaded guilty to charges that she and an accomplice set her Las Vegas pet store on fire with 25 puppies inside in an insurance scam was sentenced on Wednesday to at least five years in prison, a court official said.

headline.main: Bariatric Surgery Reduces Pregnancy Problems in Obese Women
headline.print_headline: Surgery for Obesity May Aid Pregnancies

docs.abstract: A study of nearly 3,000 obese women found that weight-loss surgery lowered the risk for some pregnancy complications like gestational diabetes and miscarriage.
docs.snippet: A study of nearly 3,000 obese women found that weight-loss surgery lowered the risk for some pregnancy complications like gestational diabetes and miscarriage.

docs.lead_paragraph: A suburban Detroit couple who have two older children are adjusting to life after becoming parents to identical triplets — a multiple birth that's rare.

headline.main: Family Celebrating One-Month Birthdays of Identical Triplets
headline.print_headline: Family Celebrating One-Month Birthdays of Identical Triplets

docs.snippet: A suburban Detroit couple who have two older children are adjusting to life after becoming parents to identical triplets — a multiple birth that's rare.

docs.lead_paragraph: A former Las Vegas pet shop owner who was caught on surveillance video torching her business before 27 puppies and dogs were rescued last year failed to sway her sentencing judge with a courtroom announcement Wednesday that she was three months pregnant.
